plusCode.compoundCode: P2W7+QH Manhattan, New York, NY, USA

adrFormatAddress: 308 5th Ave 5th Floor, Manhattan, NY 10001, USA

originalText.text: I came to Dr Borenstein over a year ago with a torn meniscus injury to my knee. He offered me a free evaluation. A week later he performed a stem cell procedure and after a 10 days I was able to walk up and down the stairs without any pain!! He called me several times after the procedure to see how I was doing . I have been pain free for over a year now and I can walk for 1 1/2 miles every day and I have no problem with running on the treadmill .The best thing was that I was able to avoid surgery. I highly recommend Dr Borenstein and his staff at the New York Stem Cell Treatment Center  if you contemplating Stem cells for your knees.

originalText.text:
I am a 49 year old male who was diagnosed two years ago with osteoarthritis in both hips. The recommendation was that I get a hip replacement on both hips, but was also cautioned that due to my age, I would likely have to repeat the process in 10 years' time. That was not an option for me so I opted to manage the situation as best I could.

In December 2016 my hips started hurting me more and I knew that I had to address my situation. After extensive searching, I found Dr Borenstein and contacted him via his website. I was pleasantly surprised to get a call from him that same evening, during which we discussed my treatment options and made arrangements for him to review my records. After reviewing my xrays and report, he advised me that stem cell therapy was a viable option for me, and invited me to make an appointment for treatment.

When I arrived for my treatment I was greeted by Dr Borenstein, who seemed very affable. After completing my sign in forms we went through the consultation, during which I was advised of the potential risks and benefits of the procedure, what to expect of the treatment and my recovery phase, and discussed any other issues that might be affecting me as a result of my condition. I was quite surprised when, on hearing that I had back issues, he requested my MRI and indicated that he would treat that too!

The procedure itself was quite straighforward. Liposuction from the right buttocks, an hour long stroll around Lincoln Centre while the stem cells were separated, the extraction of blood, plasma separation, locating the injection sites and the injection of the stem cells and plasma all took 3 1/2 hrs, including my back.

Did it hurt? Yes! Probably a 5 on the childbirth scale and a solid 10 on the man flu scale. But after the lidocaine injection into the hip after the stem cells, the pain that I had lived with for years was gone! My range of motion was 100% better immediately after the procedure and has remiained that way for two weeks so far.

Dr Borenstein has checked up on me at least every other day since the procedure and continues to be pleased with my progress. I have recommended him to at least 6 people so far and would encourage others to check with him before making a decision that you may regret for the rest of your life.

With physiotherapy, my prognosis for getting back to running is looking good. I am exremely grateful to Dr Borenstein and his staff, Karen and Lisa, for giving me the chance to reclaim my quality of life. Talk to him before you make that final decision. You will not regret it.

originalText.text:
A few of years back, I fell and had a torn meniscus on both knees. As time went by, arthritis took over and changed my life dramatically.  I live in upstate New York were the cold weather can be an enemy for people with arthritis.  During this time, I saw four (4) different specialists who could not do anything but give me cortisone and gel shots which only lasted a few months and provided “minimal” relief.  I walked around holding on to the walls feeling as if my knees were going to crumble at any moment.  The last specialist wanted to do a partial knee replacement for each knee, which I couldn’t understand as I am only in my mid-40’s!  In search of different alternatives, I did a lot of research into the Stem Cell treatment and decided to meet with Dr. Borenstein.  He answered my every question, phone call and email with amazing knowledge, professionalism, sympathy and understanding.
I was very skeptical at first but felt I needed to exhaust every other avenue before going ahead with such a dramatic and permanent solution as partial knee replacement surgery. I scheduled and received the stem cell treatment November 2016 and the recuperation has been mind-blowing in an awesome and very positive way.  Just six days after treatment, I was able to stretch my knees in bed!  I cannot even tell you when was the last time I was able to do that without feeling that knees would crack.  Little by little, I started feeling better each day. I was no longer doing the “penguin” walk (especially when getting out of bed). Cold days were more manageable and not as painful as they once were.  Day 10th was amazing to me; I was super busy at work and took the stairs, walking down one leg in front of the other (a thought that no longer existed on my mind) and when I realized what I was doing, a HUGE smile of happiness took over!  Since then, everyday has been better and better! Dr. Borenstein has been there for me every step of the way, answering my every text message, cheering me up and giving me the life back that I so desperately needed.  I cannot believe that the FDA will approve the knee replacement surgery, where they will actually CUT your own bones (which is irreversible), but they won’t approve a stem cell treatment that comes from ones own body!  When I go to Physical Therapy (to strengthen my muscles) and I see people there screaming of pain from their knee surgeries and my heart aches for them.  I thank God every day for crossing my path with Dr. Borenstein before it was too late!
If you have been told you need surgery, do yourself a HUGE favor and contact Dr. Borenstein first. I pray that he can help your situation as he helped mine.  I went on vacation this Christmas and was able to dance…Dance, (an activity that my mind had deleted completely) before my stem cell treatment!  I will be forever grateful to Dr. David Borenstein for his extensive knowledge, understanding and for restoring and giving me back MY OWN KNEES!!!

originalText.text: I highly recommend Manhattan Integrative Medicine.  Dr. Borenstein was able to accomplish what no other doctor could do in three years, make me feel better.  In fact, it is only through Dr. Borenstein that I can enjoy my life again. He listens to how you feel and really cares.  His priority is making you better.  I have yet to find another doctor like Dr. Borenstein. His entire office is caring and understanding that you do not feel well.  They always treat you with respect and are very accommodating.  I have never recommended a doctor but felt compelled to give Dr. Borenstein the recognition he deserves.

originalText.text: Best doctor and most caring person ever. Lisa is an angel  all the reviews are the truth and then some. God bless dr b his family and staff. I wish he never left ny  dr b. Come back  ny and all of us need u. Wish my ride had shown up last time we were to meet.  Everyone who is sick in any way needs dr b !!!   U r so kind and needed  a very smart and caring dr  man and friend. May  God always b next to u. I so need your help ASAP. So many more illnesses and pain has gotten really unbearable.  U r the only one who can keep me alive and take away all the sickness and pain from the fall   Help me please. My breathing has got worse. My hips and complete L spine  the t11-12  I have so much bone pain. You almost got me out of the wheel chair and walking  until I fell and broke my hip and tail bone  a few days after ur treatment. Well one of them.  I’ve been in hosp so much  now I have gastroparesis    gastritis  tremors. Other stuff too miss u and Lisa   Heal me please for my grand babies.  The calcitonin was helping some of my bone pain  we truly all need u. Especially me  Thoughts and prayers.
